name: ROPES! (ThkQ)
description:
ROPES

Ropes is a game that engages you with the action of interesting Grappling Hooks, Your Goal is to survive for the longest possible time.

Similar to a platformer you have can Grapple onto the White Blocks, The Red Blocks will reduce your hearts, you will die if you bash deep into the Lava, or if you run out of hearts

NOTES

There is no Menu/Stats right now, The game is in development and incase of any bugs, comment on the itch.io page.

PLAY THE GAME ONLY IN FULLSCREEN MODE
